Row.Text: I see you are also practiced in the subtler arts of statecraft. I've always rather enjoyed a bit of espionage, myself.
I am only interested in people worthy of my time. You are obviously one of them.
I commend you on your prudence. To aid that city-state is to invite death.
There is no shame in deterrence. Having a weapon is very different from actually using it.
You are a good friend and ally. Gilgamesh will remember this.
You would make a good Spartan… resilient, strong, brave.
A strong navy… that’s a beautiful sight.
You build your empire as the Rising Sun: powerful and brilliant.
I welcome the words of your prophets and priests. We learn so much from their good works.
Imagine all of the amazing things the brilliant minds of my nation will accomplish.
You are wise to leave our neighboring city-state to us.
Yours is a society to emulate. Arts, sciences… what don’t you have?
I am relieved you understand that we cannot tolerate heretics. It is against God, of course.
It is good that you do not try to compete with the glorious empire of Qin. Our wonders are inimitable.
Blessings be upon you. You spread truth and compassion through your acts in the name of the magnificent and perfect God.
Thanks for keeping the peace on the continent. Bully for you!
Our two nations have never been stronger. May you have many victories in times of peace.
The reach of your empire is as Jupiter’s over the heavens. Well done.
Please accept my warmest thanks for your kind endeavors on the continent we share.
(You are strong in diplomatic visibility and spies)
(You have a strong military)
(You are not attacking or allying city-states)
(You are keeping the peace)
(You are one of my friends)
(You have fought honorably and not capitulated in a peace deal)
(You have a strong navy)
(You are strong in military and also in Faith and Culture)
(You have established a Religion and brought it to Kongo)
(You are not threatening to gain more Great People)
(You are not competing over city-states)
(You are strong in Science and Culture)
(You share his Religion)
(You are not threatening to build more wonders)
(You have his religious building in your empire)
(You have kept the peace on his home continent)
(You are one of her friends)
(Your empire is large)
(You share the same home continent)
Kudos - Reason Unknown
I am impressed with the unique culture your people are developing.
I'm hearing talk that your people want to celebrate your rule. Nice job keeping them happy.
Your treasury is filling up quite nicely. It's always nice to have such strong income, isn't it?
I extend my heartiest congratulations on the productivity of your people.
We are true friends with the smaller civilizations. We appreciate that you recognize this fact.
The number of people living in your empire is truly impressive.
I am impressed with the depth of your scientific research.
I love a leader who is surrounded by an impressive military.
It is in combat that the true soul of a civilization is revealed. May the best man win.
I am pleased to see that the great minds of the world prefer our empire to yours.
It makes me happy that you leave the wonder building to us.
Your protection of a city-state's right to exist sets an example for all the world to follow.
The strong should protect the weak. It is good to see you agree.
I must say, the power of your airforce is not one to be trifled with. Very nice.
It is an admirable thing to look out for those who cannot look out for themselves.
These Barbarians have been a nuisance to us all. Thank you for your help!
We have only been given one earth, and I am glad that I am not the only one to respect that.
The world is ours for the taking! And take it, you have.
I see you're a like-minded individual, and must commend your government practices.
Great minds think alike, I see. There are so many uses for that technology...
Peace be to you and yours. It is heartening to see another just as pious as myself.
Yes, very good. Leave the exploring to me.
I am relieved to see that your empire poses no threat to ours.
[NEWLINE](You have satisfied {Name}'s agenda, {Agenda})
Even after all we have done, I still worry that there are some souls that do not want to be saved.
It is good that you have chosen the right faith. You probably did so from admiration of me. That is understandable.
You really should start paying attention to what's going on around you. There are games being played here on so many levels.
You are not worthy to bask in our presence. Your power is as fragile as your army is weak.
I will destroy my enemies, and if you continue to help them, I will destroy you as well.
If you are so bloodthirsty, maybe it is better to put an end to your leadership.
If you harm my friends, you will face the might of Uruk; this I promise you.
Are you such a coward, to avoid bloodshed? To yield so easily? Where is your honor?
Your seas are unprotected, friend. All too easy to raid.
To follow Bushido is to train the body, the mind, and the soul… but where can your people do so?
I can only assume your reluctance to spread your religion comes from lack of conviction.
Your finest engineers and architects would be happier in a place where they could grow. Brasil, for instance.
That city is ours. I would suggest you don’t interfere.
Your people are starved for knowledge and beauty, and yet you ignore science and art. Why?
Rather than penitent, you are blasphemous. The vengeance of God will be upon your head.
What need do you have for wonder when you can look upon the works of the Middle Kingdom?
I will not abide sacrilege. You will pay for your blasphemy against the most exalted, he who knows no imperfections.
No man is above the law. It behooves you to remember that.
Loyalty is its own reward. Do you not know this?
You have left the richest parts of the land for your enemies to claim. Are you so scared of expansion?
You tread on dangerous waters in the face of England and her loyal colonies.
(You are weak in diplomatic visibility and Spies.)
(You have a weak military.)
(You are conquering or allying with city-states.)
(You are warmongering.)
(You have denounced one of my friends.)
(You have never gone to war or have capitulated in a peace deal.)
(You have a weak navy.)
(You are strong in military but not in Faith and Culture.)
(You have established a religion but not brought it to Kongo.)
(You have recruited more Great People.)
(You are competing over city-states.)
(You are weak in Science and Culture.)
(You are spreading your religion into his cities.)
(You have built more wonders.)
(You started a rival Religion, especially if you are at war with a civilization following his Religion.)
(You have attacked someone on his home continent.)
(You have backstabbed a friend or declared a surprise war.)
(Your empire is small.)
(You have a presence on a continent she wants to settle.)
Warning - Reason Unknown
You are not doing much to develop a strong culture. What will we have to remember about your people?
You might want to look into a few more amenities for your citizens. I don't think they are enjoying your rule.
Your empire is headed toward bankruptcy. How can you survive with debt piling up?
You tread on dangerous ground by making common cause with city-states. Leave them to us.
Your people are lazy and unworthy. If you can produce nothing, your civilization will soon be forgotten.
There are so few people living in your empire. It must be hard to get anything done.
You are not spending much time on research. How will your people keep up?
You have so few troops. Aren't you scared for your life?
Your cities are so close. Your troops are so strong. You are making me nervous!
Your recruitment of great people we coveted is becoming a real problem.
Do you not realize that we are supposed to be the preeminent builders of wonders?
Only cowards attack the small powers of the world. You are worthless to us.
Consider this a warning. Do not attack the minor powers again.
There is no glory to keeping your feet on the ground. You should really try building an airforce.
It is a deplorable thing to bully the weak.
How can you let those Barbarians run amok so close to your home?
I must tell you that your destruction of our earth is not just affecting you, but your neighbors as well.
Bountiful lands surround you! How can you ignore them?
Our ideological differences are only the beginning. I cannot approve of the way you govern your people...
Nuclear weaponry is the future! How can you not see that?
What guides you? Surely, you cannot believe in nothing. Come, show your people the light!
There is only so much to discover, and I'm afraid I cannot abide anyone who sets out ahead of my own explorers.
[NEWLINE](You have transgressed {Name}'s agenda, {Agenda})
I am making a gift of my religion to you! Why do you not accept? You will shame yourself, and face destruction in the afterlife!
I intend to see the salvation of your soul, whether you want it or not!
